summary: "Mike" is my step dad and I decided to make a follower of him in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
You can find him in the inn in riverwood. He is a Paladin but you will have to give him weapons because he doesn't come with them. He is currently in daedric armor without a helmet, because who needs helmets?Â
